# Choose your adventure!

.pull-left45[

<u>Base track</u><br>

<font size="6"><b>Practical - Case studies</b></font><br>

Work on one or all of 3 case studies designed to repeat the central elements of **Data I/O**, **Data Wrangling**, and **Statistics**<br><br>

<b>1 Clinical trial</b><br>
Analyse a clinical trial comparing the effectiveness of drugs on reducing histamine.<br><br>
<b>2 Finance</b><br>
Study the development of key financial markets across the last 20 years<br><br>
<b>3 Sales</b><br>
Analyze sales from a real-world retailer across time and locations.<br><br>

]

.pull-right45[

<u>Advanced track</u><br>

<font size="6"><b>Machine Learning</b></font><br>

Learn... 

...when machine learning algorithms like **Random forests**, **Decisions trees**, and **Regression** work and why.

...how they are **implemented in R** to improve prediction performance in a real world data set.  

]
